title: Angler

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, cast your hook outside someone's house, learning of their visitors.
- During the day, choose to remove "caught" from any number of players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Non-evil players who visit the hooked house will be "caught".
- When a caught player dies, they will be cleaned.
- If a caught player visits a house with a hook, you attack them.
- If you die, all currently caught players are no longer caught.
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4816
*You needa' be real patient to be a fisher.*
